org.apache.james.management
Interface SpoolManagementMBean

All Known Implementing Classes:
SpoolManagement
public interface SpoolManagementMBean

Expose spool management functionality through JMX.

Method Summary
 String[] listSpoolItems(String spoolRepositoryURL)
          List mails on the spool whose state is ERROR
 int removeSpoolItems(String spoolRepositoryURL, String key)
          Removes one specific or all mails from the given spool repository
 int resendSpoolItems(String spoolRepositoryURL, String key)
          (Re-)tries to send one specific or all mails with status ERROR in the given spool repository
 

Method Detail

listSpoolItems

String[] listSpoolItems(String spoolRepositoryURL)
                        throws SpoolManagementException
List mails on the spool whose state is ERROR

Parameters:
spoolRepositoryURL - specifies the spool
Returns:
number of removed items
Throws:
SpoolManagementException

removeSpoolItems

int removeSpoolItems(String spoolRepositoryURL,
                     String key)
                     throws SpoolManagementException
Removes one specific or all mails from the given spool repository

Parameters:
spoolRepositoryURL - specifies the spool
key - identifies the item to be removed. if NULL, all items are removed
Returns:
number of removed items
Throws:
SpoolManagementException

resendSpoolItems

int resendSpoolItems(String spoolRepositoryURL,
                     String key)
                     throws SpoolManagementException
(Re-)tries to send one specific or all mails with status ERROR in the given spool repository

Parameters:
spoolRepositoryURL - specifies the spool
key - identifies the item to be sent. if NULL, all items with status ERROR are sent
Returns:
number of processed items
Throws:
SpoolManagementException
